item.title: Blackfield Exploitation HackTheBox
Reverse Engineering part 1
item.description: REVERSE ENGINEERING:UPX PACKED EXECUTABLE Attached is a binary called good luck. You are expected to reverse engineer it and capture the flag. Alternatively, the binary can be found at https://www.dropbox.com/s/mq70390yokr2l02/goodluck?dl=0 I have started by checking what kind of a file it is from the terminal There is not much information from that except for the fact that it is a 64bit executable. The next is trying to execute it to see its behavior
